department: Public Works and Government Services Canada
description: The Public Procurement Center (TPSGC) notifies the industry of the intent to award a contract for Ultra-Miniature Raman Spectrometer, to be furnished exclusively by Bay Spec, based on the notice., in accordance with the trade agreements and the ARC-1751-A. The deal could be done within 60 days.
tags: Public Works and Government Services Canada
